contest-event.event-date: Oct. 27, 1956 D National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) 1 Test Piece Contest National Championship of Great Britain (Finals) national-finals-championship-section European Championships The current Nationals contest began in 1900, but there was a previous 'Nationals' contest run 40 years earlier: Enderby Jackson's Great National Contest. Championship Festival Music Royal Albert Hall, Kensington, Kensington and Chelsea, Greater London, England, UK Prizes: 1st: 200 Guineas 2nd: 150 Guineas 3rd: 75 Guineas 4th: 50 Guineas Reference to this contest made in an article in Coal Magazine can be found here: http://www.dmm-gallery.org.uk/coalmag/5612a.htm May 18, 2010, 1:31 p.m. Oct. 14, 2011, 3:01 p.m. 1 Fairey Band George Willcocks 2 City of Manchester Alex Mortimer 3 The GUS Band Stanley Boddington 4 Brighouse and Rastrick Band Willie Wood 5 Fodens Band Rex Mortimer 6 Black Dyke Band Jack Emmott 7 Morris Motors Band Stanley Boddington Unknown Result Creswell Colliery Band George Thompson Unknown Result Cory Band Stan Brown Unknown Result Ransome Band David Aspinall Unknown Result Lewis Merthyr Band Oliver Jones Unknown Result Camborne Town Band Fred Roberts Unknown Result Barry, Ostlere & Shepherd John Faulds Unknown Result Crookhall Colliery Rex Mortimer Unknown Result Hazell's Printing Works George Crossland Unknown Result Westoe Band George Thompson Unknown Result Rushden Windmill Band William Scholes Unknown Result Yorkshire Imperial Brass Band Bernard Burns Unknown Result Clydebank Burgh Band John Hoggans
